settings.title: The Fusion Of Performance, Sustainability, And Durability
settings.text:
LACLAVI is engineered for peak performance, harnessing the cutting-edge SoronaÂ® Agile fabric by DuPontTM.

The Superior resilience and wrinkle resistance Stemming from its unique molecular structure and engineered fibers, it maintains durability over time. Even after repeated wear and washing, it retains its original shape and smoothness, providing lasting comfort and freedom of movement.

Breathability and Moisture-Wicking Innovation SoronaR Agile, featuring its unique "snowman-shaped" fiber cross-section, spreads the moisture across a larger surface area, facilitating quicker evaporation and ensuring outstanding breathability and rapid drying. Acting as a natural moisture-wicking system, it guarantees cool comfort on the course.

Revolutionizing Sustainability with Bio-PDO Compound Its eco-friendly design features the groundbreaking Bio-PDO compound, converting a formerly chemical process into a sustainable biological one. Compared to Nylon 6, it consumes 30% less energy and emits 63% fewer greenhouse gases, significantly reducing your environmental footprint.

Long-lasting Colorfastness Thanks to SoronaR Agile's special fibres, inherent molecular structure, and unique finishing processes, it maintains its vibrant color without fading from heat, UV radiation, or chlorine, ensuring an eye-catching style on the course.

SoronaR Agile maintains enduring elasticity even in the most challenging environments, setting it apart as the premier choice for performance-driven apparel. Experience the fusion of performance, sustainability, and durability with LACLAVI.
